TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopedSignatureReader extends System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader
Public NotInheritable Class EnvelopedSignatureReader Inherits DelegatingXmlDictionaryReader

summary.span: Contiene un lector que apunta a XML firmado envuelto para proporcionar un lector que se pueda usar para leer el contenido sin tener que procesar la signatura.

span.span: Wraps a reader that is pointing to enveloped signed XML to provide a reader that can be used to read the content without having to process the signature.

summary.span: La signatura se valida automáticamente cuando se lee el último elemento del sobre.

span.span: The signature is automatically validated when the last element of the envelope is read.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified reader and security token serializer.

summary.span: Lee el siguiente nodo del flujo.

span.span: Reads the next node from the stream.

returns.span: Es si se lee correctamente el siguiente nodo; es si no hay más nodos.

span.span: if the next node was read successfully; if there are no more nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Comprueba si se alcanza el final de la envoltura y si valida la firma si la `requireSignature` se especificó el parámetro `true` en el constructor.Checks whether the end of the envelope is reached and validates the signature if the `requireSignature` parameter was specified `true` in the constructor. Si obtiene el lector en un `` elemento, se lee la firma completa en if el `automaticallyReadSignature` se especificó el parámetro `true` en el constructor.If the reader gets positioned on a `` element, the whole signature is read in if the `automaticallyReadSignature` parameter was specified `true` in the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SigningCredentials As SigningCredentials

summary.span: Obtiene las credenciales de firma que se usan en la signatura, después de que se consume el sobre y cuando se valida la signatura.

span.span: Gets the signing credentials that are used in the signature, after the envelope is consumed and when the signature is validated.
The signing credentials.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryReadSignature() cil managed

summary.span: Lee la signatura si el lector se encuentra actualmente en un elemento .

span.span: Reads the signature if the reader is currently positioned at a element.

returns.span: si la signatura se leyó correctamente; si no, .

span.span: if the signature was successfully read; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el lector está situado actualmente en un `` elemento, se invoca el método para leer la firma.If the reader is currently positioned on a `` element, invokes the method to read the signature.
